tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: make triggers and caches for organisations adding budget_org_code from amp_organisation

script.lang:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_all_orgs_dimension CASCADE@@@ CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_all_orgs_dimension AS SELECT org.amp_org_id AS org_id, org.name AS org_name, org.org_code, org.acronym AS org_acronym, grp.amp_org_grp_id AS org_grp_id, grp.org_grp_name AS org_grp_name, tp.amp_org_type_id AS org_type_id, tp.org_type AS org_type_name, tp.org_type_code, org.budget_org_code FROM amp_organisation org FULL OUTER JOIN amp_org_group grp ON org.org_grp_id = grp.amp_org_grp_id FULL OUTER JOIN amp_org_type tp ON grp.org_type = tp.amp_org_type_id@@@
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ni_all_orgs_dimension CASCADE@@@ CREATE TABLE ni_all_orgs_dimension AS SELECT * FROM v_ni_all_orgs_dimension@@@
CREATE INDEX aod_org_id ON ni_all_orgs_dimension(org_id)@@@ CREATE INDEX aod_org_grp_id ON ni_all_orgs_dimension(org_grp_id)@@@ CREATE INDEX aod_org_type_id ON ni_all_orgs_dimension(org_type_id)@@@
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_organisation_caches_internal() RETURNS bigint AS $BODY$ BEGIN TRUNCATE ni_all_orgs_dimension;
CREATE TEMPORARY SEQUENCE ni_all_orgs_dimension_seq; INSERT INTO ni_all_orgs_dimension SELECT COALESCE(org_id, - nextval('ni_all_orgs_dimension_seq')) AS org_id, COALESCE(org_name, '#') AS org_name, COALESCE(org_code, '#') AS org_code, COALESCE(org_acronym, '#') AS org_acronym, COALESCE(org_grp_id, - nextval('ni_all_orgs_dimension_seq')) AS org_grp_id, COALESCE(org_grp_name, '#') AS org_grp_name, COALESCE(org_type_id, - nextval('ni_all_orgs_dimension_seq')) AS org_type_id, COALESCE(org_type_name, '#') AS org_grp_name, COALESCE(org_type_code, '#') AS org_type_code,COALESCE(budget_org_code, '#') AS budget_org_code FROM v_ni_all_orgs_dimension;
DROP SEQUENCE ni_all_orgs_dimension_seq; RETURN 1; end; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql VOLATILE; @@@
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_organisation_caches() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $BODY$ declare dummy bigint; BEGIN SELECT into dummy update_organisation_caches_internal() FROM (select 1) AS dual; RETURN NULL; end; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql VOLATILE; @@@
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_organisation_caches_trg_organisation ON amp_organisation@@@ DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_organisation_caches_trg_org_group ON amp_org_group@@@ DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_organisation_caches_trg_org_type ON amp_org_type@@@
CREATE TRIGGER update_organisation_caches_trg_organisation AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE OR TRUNCATE ON amp_organisation EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_organisation_caches() @@@
CREATE TRIGGER update_organisation_caches_trg_org_group AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE OR TRUNCATE ON amp_org_group EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_organisation_caches() @@@
CREATE TRIGGER update_organisation_caches_trg_org_type AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE OR TRUNCATE ON amp_org_type EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_organisation_caches() @@@
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE DUMMY_TABLE_YOU_SHOULD_NOT_SEE_IT_WE_ARE_TRYING_TO_MAKE_XML_PATCHER_HAPPY_1 AS SELECT update_organisation_caches_internal() FROM (select 1) AS dual @@@ DROP TABLE DUMMY_TABLE_YOU_SHOULD_NOT_SEE_IT_WE_ARE_TRYING_TO_MAKE_XML_PATCHER_HAPPY_1 @@@
UPDATE amp_global_settings SET settingsvalue = 'true' WHERE settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart' @@@
